titleStmt.title: A brief history of Moscovia and of other less-known countries lying eastward of Russia as far as Cathay, gather'd from the writings of several eye-witnesses / by John Milton.
titleStmt.author: Milton, John, 1608-1674.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M. Flesher, for Brabazon Alymer ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
